review: Unreliable, therefore useless. Works when the screen's on(regardless of whether this app's open/in the foreground), but silent otherwise - just a silent notification. App settings and phone settings both perfectly correct - battery optimisation disabled; each kind of notification individually enabled and alerting with sound in phone settings. No permissions requested anyway.

It's a really great app with amazing minimalist ui....ü•∞The only thing is if u could change the modes with labels like work, study and our own custom ones... I would have given it a straight 5/5... Anyway... It's an amazing app

It's actually a very good app......its simple and office to use.......its a very useful app if you want to studu without getting distracted....increases your focus.......there is also breaks in between which recharges you and with this i was able to study for hours without getting distracted......thanks to the creater for making this app....every thing is there that all i wanted......
Very nice, well designed app. It's simple and to the point, doesn't take much space, and simply it does its job. It's pretty helpful for studying. I like it's green colour palette

If you are looking for a simple timer that just does timing and has a night mode this app might be for you. In my opinion it should have at least sound and vibration to be considered a complete app. Reply to developer's response: No bugs. I mistakenly assumed there is no sound because I didn't see sound options in the settings menu. Good app nonetheless!
ras4vb: Thank you for your feedback. When a timer completes there should be a sound and vibration - if that's not the case then there is a bug.

review: Works well and they were really responsive when i asked for a small change to be made. Now it makes a notification sound even when my phone is set to silent ringtone. And i can adjust the sound it makes in the notification settings, so it's simple but very useful with a clean interface.
ras4vb: Thank you for downloading our app and taking the time to write a review :)

review: Excellent app. If you can a way to export progress data or save progress data or maybe save data on cloud. It will be perfect.
beautiful minimalist app, easy to use, i would love even more if we could add rain or white sounds in the background
Very nice app. Great colour choice by developers which gives a sense of peace. Sync features and advanced reports can added.
I've been using it for a few months and I really like it. Request you to add a yearly progress feature. I would like to know how in the past few months, not just this current month.

Nice app, but unfortunately I'll have to look for another one as the alarm sound sounds exactly like my doorbell and can't be changed. Regarding developer response: The sound that plays is NOT "my" standard notification sound I've set for apps. It's a notification sound I've never even heard on my device, that I can only assume comes with the app.
ras4vb: Thank you for your feedback. You can change the notification sound from the Android system settings.

review: It's the best app I've ever had before. The most surprising thing is that there's no any premium, every feature is available.

Good App! simple and easy to use but it took me a while to know to skip the breaks and go back to the work timer. I recommend that you should say in the app description how to skip timers, or add a mini tutorial. That way it would be a lot easier to know how to use it efficiently.
ras4vb: Thank you for taking the time to give us valuable feedback. We have recently added media buttons to faciliate skipping forwards and backwards, and will continue to consider options for a tutorial as we appreciate that the swipe mechanic is not as intuitive as we originally thought.

review: Amazing app! I wanna take this moment to thank the developers and congratulate them on the good job. The app is simple and easy to use. Although, I'd love if the app gives us a chance to edit the number of sets (25 min+5 min sets) to match the time we need. For example, if I want to work for 3 hours, I can set 6 sets of pomodoro cycles and so on. That's the only criticism I have but apart from that, amazing app. Thank you Devs. Keep up the good work!
ras4vb: Thank you for your kind words! The feature you mentioned has been requested by numerous users, so I can confirm it will make an appearance in the future :)

review: Quite simply the most elegant Pomodoro app on the Play Store! It's not flashy - and nor should it be - but it features everything that you could ever want from a Pomodoro app, wrapped in a beautiful package. Best of all? There's no ads!

Absolutely love this app‚ù§Ô∏è..so easy to use, so convenient when I need to change working time, bell is good,that is, doesn't feel disturbing...thank you for this app!! The best part is it is not a big app , so I can install it in my devices that have less memory...
Perfectly easy-use and nice üëç No premium mode( :)))))) ) or adds.Thank you very much

app with clear user interface. no annoying ads popping and the timer works in background. they also keep the work progress daily/weekly/monthly. i love how we can adjust the amount of hour per work/break session. overall a great minimalist app

This is a very simple time tracking app. It's very easy to use but please add more things (such as detailed reports, tags, reminders, widgets) I hope my feedback useful to you to update this app. (Sorry for my English. It should be wrong because my mother language is not English.)
To put it simply it is Ad-free, no in-app purchases, simple yet efficient...
Best minimalist pomodoro app. But tags are missing

This app is great Easy,safe and with a beautiful panel without extra things In this kind of apps ,REFOCUS is best NUMBER ONE but could you add it something? It will be perfect if when we pause it , it shows the time that we stop working
Just like I wanted! Simple but beautiful UI! üòç It would be more useful if there is a historical section, where we can see how many hours we used within a day! Thanks! üçÄ
ras4vb: Thank you for your review! A statistics page will be made available later this year :)

review: Great app, but I hope you can add more features like session title, and completed sessions. I'm really looking forward to it!!
ras4vb: Thank you for providing your valuable feedback. We'll keep this in mind as we continue to add new features!

review: A simple pomodoro app. Clean and easy to use - though given that I helped with the art for it, I'll admit to a little bias!

i love it! simple to use. very pretty and no purchases needed. though i would prefer it to have a built in to-do list. kind of a bummer that i have to install another app for my to-dos. still love it nonetheless.
Nice. Be good if there was a widget / widgets for running the timers. Also, it doesn't have a landscape mode currently.
ras4vb: Hello there - thank you for your feedback. We don't currently have plans for either feature, but I have added them to our backlog. If there are any other features you'd like then feel free to contact us at hello@pomodoroproject.io

review: My reviews keep getting deleted... To keep it short, it's a good app, I like it. I wish it didn't send notifications after every season though, because I have to swipe them away.
ras4vb:
Thank you for your support :)

We have since released an update that prevents notifications from being displayed after each interval.

review: Its a nice app, doing great so far, however, it would be nice to have an option to change the currently green theme into other colors such as pink.
ras4vb: Thank you for your feedback. We are working on such a feature.

review: i've tried a lot of pomodoro apps, and this app gave me the best experience ever, the interface is great and the settings is very helpful.. loved it.
I like it! It's exactly what I want, simple pomodoro timer and look high quality, the icon is pretty too!
The app is nice but it would become more useful just by adding a pause button and an alarm sound of timer completion not just vibration
ras4vb: Hi there - there should be a notification sound when the Pomodoro completes. Have you checked that the notification sounds are enabled?

review: No ticking sound. Defeats the whole purpose
Simple to use, clean UI, and very useful! Couldn't find better alternatives.
The best app for pomodoro technique i ever use
Pretty simple (not versatile)
very good, it must be downloaded. very helpfulüëç
The app was great! But the problem was the app won't notify me when the timer ends.
Its clearly a grate app that i want to suggest everyone but i want one feature in this app.l want to set vibrate sounds... Otherwise its great üëç
ras4vb: Hello there! Thank you for your feedback - we would be happy to facilitate this feature if you could please provide us with a little more information at hello@pomodoroproject.io regarding what kind of vibration options you would like!

review: Nice, well-designed and easy to use - definitely a must for the Pomodoro Technique lovers!
